Yardley Hastings's Recommended

Professional Cleaning Specialists.

We work closely with clients around Yardley Hastings and Northamptonshire to provide cost effective & high quality cleaning solutions.

Our Services
Contact Us

House Cleaning

Routine cleaning: Dusting, vacuuming, mopping, and surface cleaning in living spaces.

Office Cleaning

Office cleaning: Maintaining clean workspaces, including desks, restrooms, and more.

Commercial Cleaning

Tailored cleaning for retail, restaurants, gyms, and warehouses.

Deep Cleaning

Deep cleaning: Targeting overlooked areas like baseboards and light fixtures.

Move-In/Out Clean

Move-in/move-out cleaning for homes: Ensuring a fresh start or prep for new occupants.

Eco-Friendly Cleaning

Eco-friendly cleaning: Non-toxic products and sustainable methods for healthier spaces.

Window Cleaning

Window washing: Professional services for streak-free windows, inside and out.

Specialist Cleaning

Floor care: Carpet, hardwood, tile, and grout cleaning for lasting quality.

See How It Works!

Easy steps for a clean and healthy environment

1

Provide us with your details

Call us, or use our online contact form to provide us with your details and information

2

Arrange a visit from us

We come to you to discuss your requirements and provide a competative quotation

3

Agree on time and frequency

Whether you need us once, or every week, we will create a schedule that works around you

4

Sit back and relax

We will take care of the rest so you can enjoy your consistantly clean and healthy environment

We keep the cleaning process as simple as possible!
